# Test configuration initialization and validation

# Initialize config
exec apx config init
exists apx.yaml

# Validate the created config
exec apx config validate
stdout 'Configuration is valid'

# Test with explicit config path
exec apx --config=apx.yaml config validate
stdout 'Configuration is valid'

# Test with non-existent config
! exec apx --config=nonexistent.yaml config validate
stderr 'Configuration validation failed'
